topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Applying the NIC Bonding Patch

section.p: For bonded NIC environments, use the following steps to install a required patch. You should have downloaded the patch files in the Prerequisites.
Note: You need the Ubuntu patch utility installed on the lifecycle manager host. If you do not have the utility installed, use the following command:

ol.li: Log into the lifecycle manager host.
Copy the cg-hos-nic-bonding.patch file to /root/ directory.
Change to the root/kenobi-configuration-processor directory: cd /root/kenobi-configuration-processor
Execute the following command to launch the patch installation: patch -p1 ../cg-hos-nic-bonding.patch
Execute following command to synch the patch file: /root/cg-hlm/hlm-build/hlm_prepare-env.sh
